sortingDesc:
Select the sorting algorithm you want to visualize from the dropdown menu. 
 Use the slider to adjust the array size / the visualization speed.
 Click the "Visualize" button to start the sorting algorithm. 
 To start a new sorting visualization, click the "Restart" button and repeat the process.
pathFindingDesc:
Drag and drop the start and finish icons to different cells. 
 Place obstacles on the grid by clicking on the cells. 
 Choose one of the path-finding algorithms from the dropdown menu.
 Use the slider to adjust the speed of the algorithm visualization.
 Click the "Visualize" button to start the algorithm.
 To start a new visualization, click the "Restart" button and repeat the process.
